page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MARK
page.content: A usual day for me is to get up at 6.30 and read till seven. Then I would have a cup of tea with my dad. My dad works of the Royal Yacht Brittania. After he has gone I lay in till 7.35 then go downstairs and get the dogs breakfast. My dog is a Yorkshire Terrier and its name is Samantha and is a nice dog. For breakfast I have Sugar Puffs. I then go upstairs and have a wash and clean my teeth. Then I go downstairs and get my bag ready for school. Then I walk my dog. My friend Stephen calls for me and we go to John's house. School starts at 8.50am, but I go in early to set up the record player for assembly.
